name: ulsm
description: Roslyn-based code analysis for Unity 6.x projects via Model Context Protocol
author: Prespective

categories.name: Unity Analysis
categories.description: Unity-specific code analysis using Microsoft.Unity.Analyzers and custom pattern detection

DOTNET_SOLUTION_PATH.description: Path to .sln file to auto-load on startup

ULSM_LOG_LEVEL.description: Log level: Debug, Information, Warning, Error

ULSM_MAX_DIAGNOSTICS.description: Maximum diagnostics to return per request

ULSM_FRAMEWORK_PATH.description: Override path to .NET Framework reference assemblies (for Unity project loading). Unity targets .NET Framework 4.7.1, so this should point to a directory containing mscorlib.dll and related BCL assemblies.

ULSM_FORCE_ADHOC.description: Force AdhocWorkspace instead of MSBuildWorkspace for Unity projects. Set to 'true' to bypass MSBuild and parse .csproj files directly.

UNITY_EDITOR_PATH.description: Path to Unity Editor installation (used for reference resolution when HintPaths are relative or need remapping)
